settings.heading: How can we help  your organisation?

settings.text: Explore all the types of organisations we can offer help too below.

settings.title: Employee wellbeing
settings.subtitle: Balancing work with being a good parent can be incredibly stressful for working parents.
settings.description: We work with employers offering working parents access to the Parenting Matters course and community with additional wraparound support for groups of parents, facilitated locally. This can be provided as part of an employee wellbeing programme.
settings.organisation_text_1: of UK workers surveyed said that difficulties balancing work and family impact their job performance and work satisfaction.
settings.organisation_text_2: said their organisation supports them in managing their work and family commitments.*
settings.desc_1: Supporting working parents to achieve balance in their working and family lives.
settings.desc_2: Working parents strengthen their relationships with their children resulting in a calmer, happier  home. Parents also use the skills learned to help improve relationships with partners and work colleagues too!
settings.desc_3: Working parents who feel appreciated and supported by their employer. Employees who are less stressed at work and more focused as they are happier and more confident parents at home.

settings.title: Educational settings
settings.subtitle: Parenting Matters helps parents gain the knowledge and skills to support their child’s learning, creating a positive home learning environment.
settings.description: We work with nurseries and primary schools, offering their parents access to the Parenting Matters course and community, along with optional additional wraparound support for groups of parents, facilitated locally.
settings.desc_1: Parenting Matters equips parents with knowledge and skills to support their child's learning and improve behaviour. Positively impacting children's motivation, self-esteem, and educational outcomes.
settings.desc_2: Happier children make better learners. Tools and strategies learned by parents are more likely to be aligned with educational goals. So the collaboration supports children's academic success and positive school experiences.
settings.desc_3: By supporting parents in this way, children develop resilience, gain confidence and have improved social-emotional wellbeing.

settings.title: Parenting coaches and mental health professionals
settings.subtitle: Our programme is also designed to be used as a tool by parenting coaches and other professionals.
settings.description: It provides a structure for parents to learn new skills online, along with the extra encouragement and support from you to keep parents engaged. And by using the course alongside, you are more able to focus on parents' key issues.
settings.desc_1: Parenting Matters expands the resources available to parenting coaches. Enabling you to provide an even more comprehensive, evidence-based approach to your clients.
settings.desc_2: With the content being delivered online in a standardised way, coaches can then offer a more personalised and practical approach that helps families implement the strategies and techniques in their own home.
settings.desc_3: Parenting Matters allows coaching professionals to extend your reach beyond in-person sessions, offering online resources and support to a larger client base.

settings.title: Health professionals
settings.subtitle: Issues with a child’s behaviour, anxiety, problems sleeping or with relationships all have a significant effect on a family’s health and wellbeing.
settings.description:
There is a very large body of research showing that evidence-based parenting programmes  improve outcomes for families.

We can provide parents you support with access to our online parenting programme and exclusive parenting community. Parents learn skills that they are able to put into action immediately to create positive and lasting changes for the whole family.
settings.desc_1: Parenting Matters provides a variety of health professionals, including  health visitors,  paediatricians, GPs, school nurses and related counselling or pastoral services, with an additional.....
settings.desc_2: We know that early intervention is best in the long run. The course empowers you to provide parents with effective tools at the earliest opportunity, and as soon as potential developmental challenges present or even before.
settings.title_3: Better long-term outcomes for children and families
settings.desc_3: Parenting Matters also  addresses the social, emotional and behavioural aspects of health too.

settings.title: Charities & family hubs
settings.subtitle: We help families thrive by providing information and tools to parents to help them raise happy children with whom they have a positive relationship, while also looking after their own wellbeing.
settings.description:
Creating a positive home learning environment for their child in the early years can transform family life. 

We can provide parents you support with access to our universal parenting programme and our welcoming parenting community. We’ll also give your team access to the course and community too, so that they are familiar with the evidence-based content, tools and strategies.  This means your team can provide motivational and practical support, while knowing that all the content families need is in the programme.
settings.desc_1: Parenting Matters can be offered to vulnerable families who may face additional challenges in parenting. It provides accessible and practical guidance to help navigate parenthood, helping parents create a calmer, happier home and become a more confident parent.
settings.desc_2: By offering Parenting Matters, charities and family hubs foster a sense of community with a platform for parents to connect, share experiences, and support one another in a safe and inclusive environment.
settings.desc_3: The course equips parents with knowledge and skills, enhancing their resilience and empowering them to overcome obstacles in their parenting. This positively impacts the overall wellbeing of families and contributes to stronger communities.

settings.community_description: “I have run a Parenting Matters group online in our school. There were many moving movements where the course would create opportunities for parents to hear and support each other with kindness and compassion, feel normal and less ‘rubbish parent’ While at the same time supporting each other to put into practice the strategies from the programme. “

“The Parenting Matters programme has made life and home so much easier and has enabled me to find a much better work/life balance. Before I took the programme I was distracted at work and wondering about giving it up. Now I can really concentrate on work when I'm there and feel much more enthusiastic about my job while at the same time enjoying my children.”
“I just wanted to say how helpful and great this course is. I wish I had had it earlier. Every parent should have this information. It's like a lightbulb has gone off in my head.”
“We really enjoyed it and I got even more hugs than I normally do.”

settings.heading_text: Want to know more about how we could work with your organisation?
settings.small_text: We’d be happy to talk to you.
